Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* FROM ewa_mod A WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( (@EWA_RECYCLE = '1' AND A.mod_status = 'DEL') OR (@EWA_RECYCLE IS NULL AND A.mod_status != 'DEL') )

Set.Name: OnFrameRestore SQL

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_cfgs SET description = @description , emc_mdate = @sys_date , emc_adm_id = 0 , emc_def_xmlname = @emc_def_xmlname , emc_def_itemname = @emc_def_itemname WHERE mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id AND xmlname = @xname AND itemname = @iname

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * from ( SELECT a.mod_ver_id , description , emc_cdate , emc_mdate , emc_adm_id , emc_sup_id , a.xmlname as xname , a.itemname as iname , B.mod_code , B.mod_ver , a.emc_def_xmlname , a.emc_def_itemname FROM ewa_mod_cfgs A LEFT JOIN ewa_mod_ver B ON A.mod_ver_id = B.mod_ver_id WHERE a.mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id ) aa WHERE 1=1 order by mod_ver_id, xname, iname

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: delete from ewa_mod_cfgs WHERE mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id AND xmlname = @xname AND itemname = @iname

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO ewa_mod_ddl (emd_id, mod_ver_id, emd_ewa_conn, table_name, table_catalog, table_schema, emd_database_type, emd_type, emd_ddl_sql, emd_export, emd_export_where, emd_cdate, emd_adm_id, emd_sup_id) VALUES ( @emd_id, @mod_ver_id, @emd_ewa_conn, @table_name, @table_catalog, @table_schema, @emd_database_type, @emd_type, @emd_ddl_sql, @emd_export, @emd_export_where, @SYS_DATE, @emd_adm_id, @emd_sup_id)

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_ddl SET emd_ddl_sql = @emd_ddl_sql, emd_export = @emd_export, emd_export_where = @emd_export_where, emd_mdate = @SYS_DATE, emd_adm_id = 0 WHERE emd_id = @emd_id

Set.Sql: INSERT INTO ewa_mod ( mod_code, mod_name, mod_name_en, mod_open_source , mod_company, mod_contact, mod_web, mod_email, mod_osp, mod_memo , mod_memo_en, mod_cdate, mod_mdate, mod_status , mod_adm_id, mod_sup_id ) VALUES ( @mod_code, @mod_name, @mod_name_en, @mod_open_source , @mod_company, @mod_contact, @mod_web, @mod_email, @mod_osp, @mod_memo , @mod_memo_en, @SYS_DATE, @SYS_DATE, 'NEW' , 0, 0 )

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod SET mod_name = @mod_name, mod_name_en = @mod_name_en, mod_open_source = @mod_open_source, mod_company = @mod_company, mod_contact = @mod_contact, mod_web = @mod_web, mod_email = @mod_email, mod_osp = @mod_osp, mod_memo = @mod_memo, mod_memo_en = @mod_memo_en, mod_mdate = @SYS_DATE WHERE mod_code = @mod_code

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod SET mod_name = @mod_name, mod_name_en = @mod_name_en, mod_open_source = @mod_open_source, mod_company = @mod_company, mod_contact = @mod_contact, mod_web = @mod_web, mod_email = @mod_email, mod_osp = @mod_osp, mod_memo = @mod_memo, mod_memo_en = @mod_memo_en, mod_mdate = @SYS_DATE WHERE mod_code = @mod_code

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO ewa_mod_ver ( mod_ver_id , mod_code, mod_ver, mod_ver_cdate, mod_ver_mdate , mod_ver_memo, mod_ver_memo_en, mod_ver_status , mod_ver_adm_id, mod_ver_sup_id ) VALUES ( ewa_func.snowflake() , @mod_code, @mod_ver, @SYS_DATE, @SYS_DATE , @mod_ver_memo, @mod_ver_memo_en, 'USED' , 0, 0 )

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_ver SET mod_ver = @mod_ver, mod_ver_mdate = @SYS_DATE, mod_ver_memo = @mod_ver_memo, mod_ver_memo_en = @mod_ver_memo_en WHERE mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* , B.pkg_dlv_date , b.pkg_md5 , b.pkg_len , C.mod_ewa_conn , b.pkg_publish_time , b.pkg_publish_url , b.pkg_publish_status FROM ewa_mod_ver A LEFT JOIN ewa_mod_package B ON A.mod_ver_id = B.mod_ver_id INNER JOIN EWA_MOD C ON A.MOD_CODE = C.MOD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.mod_ver_status = CASE WHEN @EWA_RECYCLE='1' THEN 'DEL' ELSE 'USED' END AND A.mod_code = @mod_code ORDER BY mod_ver_id DESC

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_ver SET mod_ver_status='DEL' , mod_ver_mdate = @sys_date WHERE mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id

Set.Name: OnFrameRestore SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_ver SET mod_ver_status = 'USED' , mod_ver_mdate = @sys_date WHERE mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行/javascript_func() as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* FROM ewa_mod A WHERE mod_code = @mod_code

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO ewa_mod ( mod_code, mod_name, mod_name_en, mod_open_source , mod_company, mod_contact, mod_web, mod_email, mod_osp, mod_memo , mod_memo_en, mod_cdate, mod_mdate, mod_status , mod_adm_id, mod_sup_id , mod_meta_db_name, mod_work_db_name, mod_ewa_conn ) VALUES ( @mod_code, @mod_name, @mod_name_en, @mod_open_source , @mod_company, @mod_contact, @mod_web, @mod_email, @mod_osp, @mod_memo , @mod_memo_en, @SYS_DATE, @SYS_DATE, 'NEW' , 0, 0 , @mod_meta_db_name, @mod_work_db_name, @mod_ewa_conn )

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod SET mod_name = @mod_name, mod_name_en = @mod_name_en, mod_open_source = @mod_open_source, mod_company = @mod_company, mod_contact = @mod_contact, mod_web = @mod_web, mod_email = @mod_email, mod_osp = @mod_osp, mod_memo = @mod_memo, mod_memo_en = @mod_memo_en, mod_mdate = @SYS_DATE, mod_adm_id = 0, mod_meta_db_name = @mod_meta_db_name, mod_work_db_name = @mod_work_db_name, mod_ewa_conn = @mod_ewa_conn WHERE mod_code = @mod_code

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Info: The module description is in English

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql:
delete from ewa_mod_cfgs where mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id and exists ( select 1 from ( SELECT a.col as x, b.col as i FROM ewa_split(@xmlnames, '`') a inner join ewa_split(@itemnames, '`') b on a.idx = b.idx ) tmp where xmlname = x and itemname =i );
INSERT INTO ewa_mod_cfgs ( mod_ver_id, xmlname, itemname, description, emc_cdate, emc_mdate , emc_adm_id, emc_sup_id , emc_def_xmlname, emc_def_itemname ) SELECT @mod_ver_id, a.col, b.col, c.col, @sys_date, @sys_date , 0, 0 , a.col, b.col FROM ewa_split(@xmlnames, '`') a inner join ewa_split(@itemnames, '`') b on a.idx = b.idx inner join ewa_split(@descriptions, '`') c on a.idx = c.idx

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql:
/* cnns: "ewa`ewa`ewa" dbTypes: "MYSQL`MYSQL`MYSQL" schemas: "EWA`EWA`EWA" tableTypes: "TABLE`TABLE`TABLE" tables: "ewa_mod_cfgs`ewa_mod_data`ewa_mod_ddl" */ delete from ewa_mod_ddl where mod_ver_id = @mod_ver_id and exists ( select 1 from ( SELECT cnns.col as conn, tables1.col as tbname from ewa_split(@tables, '`') as tables1 inner join ewa_split(@cnns, '`') as cnns on tables1.idx = cnns.idx ) tmp where emd_ewa_conn = conn and table_name = tbname ) ;
INSERT INTO ewa_mod_ddl ( mod_ver_id, table_catalog, table_schema, table_name , emd_database_type, emd_type, emd_ddl_sql, emd_ewa_conn , emd_export, emd_export_where, emd_cdate, emd_mdate , emd_adm_id, emd_sup_id ) SELECT @mod_ver_id, '', schemas1.col, tables1.col , dbTypes.col, tableTypes.col, null, cnns.col , 'true', '1=2', @sys_date, @sys_date , 0, 0 from ewa_split(@schemas, '`') as schemas1 inner join ewa_split(@tables, '`') as tables1 on schemas1.idx = tables1.idx inner join ewa_split(@dbTypes, '`') as dbTypes on schemas1.idx = dbTypes.idx inner join ewa_split(@tableTypes, '`') as tableTypes on schemas1.idx = tableTypes.idx inner join ewa_split(@cnns, '`') as cnns on schemas1.idx = cnns.idx

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.UpSQL: INSERT INTO ewa_mod_download( mod_code, mod_ver, mod_name, mod_name_en , mod_open_source, mod_company, mod_contact, mod_web, mod_email , mod_osp, mod_memo, mod_memo_en , mod_cdate, mod_mdate, mod_sup_id, mod_ver_id, mod_ver_cdate, mod_ver_mdate , mod_ver_memo, mod_ver_memo_en, mod_ver_status , pkg_len, pkg_md5, pkg_file, mod_dl_cdate, mod_dl_mdate, mod_dl_status , mod_dl_sup_id, mod_dl_url) VALUES( @EWA_UP_LOCAL, '', @EWA_UP_LOCAL, '' , '', '', '', '', '' , '', '', '' , @sys_date, @sys_date, 0, -1, @sys_date, @sys_date , '', '', 'USED' , @EWA_UP_LENGTH, @EWA_UP_MD5, @EWA_UP_FILE, @sys_date, @sys_date, 'USED' , 0, '' );

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* FROM ewa_mod_import_log A WHERE log_id = @log_id

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT mod_dl_id, mod_code, mod_ver, mod_name, mod_name_en , mod_open_source, mod_company, mod_contact, mod_web, mod_email , mod_osp, mod_cdate, mod_mdate, mod_sup_id, pkg_len, pkg_md5 , mod_dl_cdate, mod_dl_mdate, mod_dl_status, mod_dl_sup_id, mod_dl_url , mod_ver_id FROM ewa_mod_download A WHERE 1=1 AND A. mod_dl_status = CASE WHEN @EWA_RECYCLE='1' THEN 'DEL' ELSE 'USED' END order by mod_dl_id desc

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_download SET mod_dl_status ='DEL' WHERE mod_dl_id = @mod_dl_id

Set.Name: OnFrameRestore SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_download SET mod_dl_status ='USED' WHERE mod_dl_id = @mod_dl_id

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行/javascript_func() as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT a.log_id, a.mod_dl_id, a.mod_code, a.mod_ver, a.mod_name , a.import_data_conn, a.replace_meta_databasename , a.replace_work_databasename, a.log_begin, a.log_end , left(a.log_content,100) log_content , left(a.log_result,100) log_result , a.log_ip, a.log_ua , a.log_ref, a.log_status FROM ewa_mod_import_log a WHERE (@mod_dl_id is null or @mod_dl_id = a.mod_dl_id) AND A.log_status = CASE WHEN @EWA_RECYCLE = '1' THEN 'DEL' ELSE 'USED' END order by log_id desc

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_import_log SET log_status='DEL' WHERE log_id = @log_id

Set.Name: OnFrameRestore SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_mod_import_log SET log_status='USED' WHERE log_id = @log_id

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行/javascript_func() as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2
